title: GIGABYTE - GS27U - 27" SS IPS Gaming Monitor - UHD 3840x2160-160Hz - 1ms MPRT - AMD FreeSync Premium - HDMI, DP - Black
description: GIGABYTE gaming monitors pack upscale performance into a streamlined package. The GS27U provides an immersive experience through fluid gameplay with 1ms MPRT response time, 160Hz refresh rate.
